short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take temporary notes on the new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the default new tab with a simple note-taking editor. It automatically saves whatever you are writing. It is your ideal companion to take quick notes.
